page.title: 17CHILDREN'S PASTIMES.
page.content: We issued Questionnaire sheets to the pupils at{Ceres Primary School.}From the information given in these we discovered children in Ceres have a wide range of hobbies from horse riding to dancing.Some of the most popular recreations are{horse riding, {swimming, highland dancing, {gymnastics, majorettes, football and {badminton.}We also found out that the pupils went to quite a lot of clubs in {Ceres}and{Cupar.}The ones in{Ceres}are {Cubs, Scouts, Brownies, Guides and {Football.}In{Cupar}they are{Swimming {and Athletics.}The children think that the shops in Ceres are good but they do their{main shopping in either Cupar {or Dundee.}Most of the children preferred to live in a village rather than a town because it is quieter.
